attributes.action: Ban horse jump racing in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Jump-racing is animal cruelty and should not be allowed in the UK. The horse death toll should not be tolerated for the sake of gambling events
attributes.background: 3 horses died at the Grand National race in 2023, taking the Aintree death toll to 62 deaths since 2000. Jump-racing is incredibly dangerous for these intelligent animals and should be banned in the UK
